scripts.publish-patch: git add .; git commit -m 'Update'; npm version patch; sudo build -m -p always; git push origin master
scripts.publish-minor: git add .; git commit -m 'Update'; npm version minor; sudo build -m -p always; git push origin master
scripts.publish-major: git add .; git commit -m 'Update'; npm version major; sudo build -m -p always; git push origin master
